Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #6 buses will operate in both directions via 71st, Coles, 75th, and South Shore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
#6 Jackson Park Express buses will operate in both directions via 71st, Coles, 75th, and South Shore.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to sewer construction on South Shore between 71st and 75th.

Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #26 buses will operate in both directions via 71st, Coles, 75th, and South Shore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
#26 South Shore Express buses will operate in both directions via 71st, Coles, 75th, and South Shore.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to sewer construction on South Shore between 71st and 75th.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 87th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 87th.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
